medical_history.chief_complaint: Increasing headaches, blurred and double vision, unsteady gait, slurred speech, nausea, and vomiting.

medical_history.past_medical_history: Right brain stem infarct in 2004, hypertension, headaches, hepatitis B, hyperlipidemia, coronary artery disease after a quadruple cardiac bypass in 2004, and mild ischemic cardiomyopathy.
medical_history.social_history: The patient had been consuming homemade hot chili pepper sauce for the previous 10 years, which he prepared himself, and was the only one in the family who ate it.
